other_tests.findings: Gallbladder is minimally distended and contains non-mobile gallstones. Gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 4 mm, with gallbladder wall edema. Several foci of adenomyomatosis noted within the gallbladder wall. Positive sonographic ___ sign. Common bile duct normal in caliber measuring 4 mm. Pancreatic duct measuring 3 mm. No intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Normal hepatopetal flow within the main portal vein. Limited images of the right kidney demonstrate no hydronephrosis or stones.
